text: Syria Live Updates: Government Forces Withdraw From Damascus Suburbs, Monitors Say  —  Two war monitoring groups said Syria's military had pulled out of a number of Damascus suburbs where anti-government protests erupted.  The movements could not immediately be confirmed.  —  Here are the latest developments.

South Korean President Yoon's impeachment vote fails after ruling party boycotts it  —  A South Korean legislative push to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol over his short-lived imposition of martial law fell through on Saturday after most lawmakers from his conservative governing party boycotted the vote.
